tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Resources (
    resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_name VARCHAR(255),
    resource_type VARCHAR(50),
    resource_link VARCHAR(255),
    creation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE video_tutorials (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    duration INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ
);

CREATE TABLE study_guides (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    content TEXT,
    author VARCHAR(100),
    created_at TIMESTAMPTZ
);

CREATE TABLE student_access (
    student_id INT,
    resource_id INT,
    access_date TIMESTAMPTZ,
    FOREIGN KEY(student_id) REFERENCES students(id),
    FOREIGN KEY(resource_id) REFERENCES video_tutorials(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE tutorials (
    tutorial_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title STRING,
    description STRING,
    video_url STRING,
    created_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE study_guides (
    guide_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title STRING,
    author STRING,
    file_path STRING,
    created_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE student_resources (
    resource_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_type STRING,
    title STRING,
    description STRING,
    file_path STRING,
    created_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE student_progress (
    progress_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id UUID,
    tutorial_id UUID,
    guide_id UUID,
    progress_percent DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE resources (
    resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    category VARCHAR(50),
    media_type VARCHAR(50),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE subscriptions (
    subscription_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    resource_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    active BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (resource_id) REFERENCES resources(resource_id)
)

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    rating INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (resource_id) REFERENCES resources(resource_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE tags (
    tag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tag_name VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
)
